name: Into Cyber
description:
This is a practise we did in a course in visual aesthetics. We practised using light sources in Unity in different ways. We also practised on creating a micro-narrative for the game. What the story is about is in our opinion up to the player to decide. (We wanted everyone to have their own story).

Take a look and perhaps get inspiration for your own creations or just enjoy a 3 min walking simulator.
